ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was supported by a Clinician Scientist Development Award from the Doris Duke Charitable Foundation (CSDA 2013105), a University of Michigan Discovery Grant, and R01 AI118886, all to ASL. The HIVE cohort was supported by NIH R01 AI097150 and CDC U01 IP00474 to ASM. JTM was supported by the Michigan Predoctoral Training Program in Genetics (T32GM007544). RJW was supported by K08 AI119182. We thank Katherine Xue for suggestions on analysis of globally circulating variants and Alexey Kondrashov and Aaron King for helpful discussion.
